original_text: These four were born to the giant in Gath, and fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
korean_text: 이 네 사람 가드의 거인족의 소생이 다윗의 손과 그의 부하들의 손에 다 넘어졌더라

sentences.original_text: These four were born to the giant in Gath
sentences.korean_translation: 이 네 사람은 가드에 있는 거인에게서 태어났으며

sentences.original_text: and fell by the hand of David
and by the hand of his servants
